short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn new vocabulary effortlessly as you browse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever felt frustrated by the amount of repetition necessary to learn vocabulary in a new language? I have. Now, you can learn vocabulary with minimal effort as you browse your favorite websites. Are you ready to learn like a child, with natural exposure to new words as you browse? Install Vocably to start growing your vocabulary with comprehensible input. 

Practice translated words in context as you browse. Read smoothly without disruption. See the original word by hovering over the translated one. Barely notice the translations as your practice pays off. 

To start, double-click on any word you want to learn and press the 'add' button to add it to your dictionary. If you need a reminder when you see the word again, hover over it to see the original word. When you feel you've learned the word, double-click on it again and press the 'remove' button.
